data.lyric:
[ti:Drankin N Smokin (Explicit)]
[ar:Future/Lil Uzi Vert]
[al:Pluto x Baby Pluto (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drankin N Smokin (Explicit) - Future/Lil Uzi Vert
[00:02.67]Future：
[00:10.89]Saggin' out the malls we do the most oh
[00:13.74]Had a ratchet in my coat got a girl doin' coke
[00:16.25]Future：
[00:16.73]We drink up and we smoke but she always do the most
[00:19.74]It kinda turn me on the way she lickin' on my stones
[00:23.01]My chains on antifreeze it look like I made a clone
[00:26.28]Wanna see you get more sassy if it bring out better emotions
[00:29.41]She called me her God the way I floated in her ocean
[00:32.20]Future：
[00:32.50]When I poured it I gave her a dose she was already hooked
[00:35.81]If you always there for me that's a really good look
[00:38.97]I'm changin' up your salary 'cause I'm gettin' to know you
[00:42.08]Tell mе your availability I want all of you
[00:45.06]Future：
[00:45.08]If it's like that then it's like that got you lightin' up like lightning
[00:48.45]I stack it up get feisty can't sabotage it or ice it
[00:51.49]You gon' tell the world they flawed thankful for when you nosy
[00:54.71]You're a good girl but you're naughty
[00:56.26]Don't you never miss out on Pilates
[00:57.84]I let you stunt and flex in Bugattis
[00:59.40]They don't got me she with a body
[01:01.01]Me and cheap girls stay cheap we do numbers stay fly
[01:04.48]If it's gettin' to you then we fast forward yeah
[01:08.44]Stayin' low like a stash house yeah
[01:11.61]Bando to bando traphouse yeah
[01:14.82]Made it with nothin' learned to swag out yeah
[01:17.96]Can't be defeated I got mad sauce yeah
[01:21.16]Why would I front like it ain't my fault
[01:23.43]Future：
[01:23.64]Drink up and we smoke but she always do the most
[01:26.19]It kinda turn me on the way she lickin' on my stones
[01:29.43]My chains on antifreeze it look like I made a clone
[01:32.51]Wanna see you get more sassy if it bring out better emotions
[01:35.83]She called me her God the way I floated in her ocean
[01:38.70]Future：
[01:38.97]She called me Messiah the way I floated in her ocean
[01:42.21]Yell "Jesus Christ" but I wasn't causin' commotion
[01:45.49]Hit it so right had her soakin' in the ocean yeah
[01:48.54]Future：
[01:51.66]Hit it all night we was drinkin' and smokin'
[01:59.90]Drinkin' and smokin'
[02:01.04]Lil Uzi Vert：
[02:01.61]I done went from GG to BB to LV
[02:04.59]I done f**ked with Kiki and Lili and Nini
[02:07.83]I text her "So proud of you" when I got my B from CC
[02:10.67]It is no way that you can know or see the things we see
[02:13.93]She said that she can tell every time that I lie through my teeth
[02:17.00]Plus I know you had somebody else right here in my sheets
[02:20.16]Oh you think you know my body
[02:22.68]Pull up in that Coupe don't want no shawty
[02:25.47]I put rubies on my Rollie now their eyes bleed
[02:28.61]I don't own no ice cream truck just know my ice freeze
[02:31.91]Man I read her text she said "Girl I creamed"
[02:34.98]Man I know she duckin' off with her side me
[02:37.97]Who know gon' hit it raw baby besides me
[02:41.04]Future：
[02:42.19]We drink up and we smoke but she always do the most
[02:45.09]It kinda turn me on the way she lickin' on my stones
[02:48.43]My chains on antifreeze it look like I made a clone
[02:51.41]Wanna see you get more sassy if it bring out better emotions
[02:54.77]She called me her God the way I floated in her ocean
[02:57.53]Future：
[02:57.83]She called me Messiah the way I floated in her ocean
[03:01.00]Yell "Jesus Christ" but I wasn't causin' commotion
[03:04.22]Hit it so right had her soakin' in the ocean yeah
[03:07.53]Lil Uzi Vert/Future：
[03:10.76]I done f**ked with Kiki and Lili and Nini
[03:18.88]Drinkin' and smokin'
data.trans:
[ti:Drankin N Smokin (Explicit)]
[ar:Future/Lil Uzi Vert]
[al:Pluto x Baby Pluto (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.67]//
[00:10.89]在商场挥霍 我们是最狠的
[00:13.74]我的外套里放着枪 有个姑娘在吸那种东西
[00:16.25]//
[00:16.73]我们喝酒 我们抽烟 但她总是最狠的
[00:19.74]她舔舐我的钻石的模样 让我有点兴奋
[00:23.01]我的项链上有好多钻石 仿佛我造了一个克隆人
[00:26.28]如果可以带来更好的心情 那我想要看你变得更时髦 
[00:29.41]我在她的海洋里徜徉 她把我称作她的上帝
[00:32.20]//
[00:32.50]当我喝好东西时 我给她也来一点 她说她已经很嗨了
[00:35.81]如果你总是陪伴着我 那就真的太棒了
[00:38.97]我要给你调薪 因为我要好好了解你
[00:42.08]告诉我 你是否有空 我想要占有全部的你
[00:45.06]//
[00:45.08]如果是那样 那就没错了 让你绽放光芒 就像闪电一样
[00:48.45]我不停挣钱 越来越富有 谁都无法阻挡我的脚步
[00:51.49]你要告诉全世界 他们有缺陷 感谢你那么爱管闲事
[00:54.71]你是个好姑娘 但你很调皮
[00:56.26]普拉提运动 你一次也不能少
[00:57.84]我让你坐着布加迪炫耀
[00:59.40]他们搞不懂我 她的身材很不错
[01:01.01]我和廉价小妞 始终很廉价 我们的产品大卖 始终很酷炫
[01:04.48]如果能够引起你的注意 那我们就要加速前进
[01:08.44]保持低调 就像藏身屋
[01:11.61]游走在各个生意场 买卖那种东西
[01:14.82]白手起家 赚大发 学会了潮流时尚
[01:17.96]战无不胜 我的力量无人能及
[01:21.16]为何我要装作好像这不是我的错
[01:23.43]//
[01:23.64]喝酒 我们抽烟 但她总是最狠的
[01:26.19]她舔舐我的钻石的模样 让我有点兴奋
[01:29.43]我的项链上有好多钻石 仿佛我造了一个克隆人
[01:32.51]如果可以带来更好的心情 那我想要看你变得更时髦 
[01:35.83]我在她的海洋里徜徉 她把我称作她的上帝
[01:38.70]//
[01:38.97]我在她的海洋里徜徉 她叫我弥赛亚
[01:42.21]大叫道 我的上帝啊 但我没有引起骚乱
[01:45.49]我的技巧超棒 让她幸福得不能自已
[01:48.54]//
[01:51.66]彻夜欢愉 我们喝酒抽烟
[01:59.90]喝酒抽烟
[02:01.04]//
[02:01.61]我穿过古驰 巴宝莉 还有路易威登
[02:04.59]我和Kiki 和Lili 和Nini都玩过
[02:07.83]当我从香奈儿店里接到我的女人 我给她发短信说 真为你骄傲
[02:10.67]你肯定不可能理解或者明白我们眼前的事情
[02:13.93]她说我每次撒谎她都能看出来
[02:17.00]而且我知道你把别人藏在我的床上
[02:20.16]你以为你了解我的身体吗
[02:22.68]开着跑车驾到 不想要任何女人
[02:25.47]我给我的劳力士镶上红宝石 现在他们的眼睛都在流血
[02:28.61]我没有冰淇淋车 我的钻石很冰冷
[02:31.91]朋友 我读了她的短信 她说 姑娘 我被彻底打败了
[02:34.98]朋友 我知道她和我的替代品在一起
[02:37.97]宝贝 除了我 还有谁会和你有那种激情
[02:41.04]//
[02:42.19]我们喝酒 我们抽烟 但她总是最狠的
[02:45.09]她舔舐我的钻石的模样 让我有点兴奋
[02:48.43]我的项链上有好多钻石 仿佛我造了一个克隆人
[02:51.41]如果可以带来更好的心情 那我想要看你变得更时髦 
[02:54.77]我在她的海洋里徜徉 她把我称作她的上帝
[02:57.53]//
[02:57.83]我在她的海洋里徜徉 她叫我弥赛亚
[03:01.00]大叫道 我的上帝啊 但我没有引起骚乱
[03:04.22]我的技巧超棒 让她幸福得不能自已
[03:07.53]//
[03:10.76]我和Kiki 和Lili 和Nini都玩过
[03:18.88]喝酒抽烟
